title: Selected films: Norman McLaren
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Animation (Cinematography)
abstract: Boogie doodle (4 min.)--Le merle (5 min.)--A chairy tale (10 min.)--A phantasy (8 min.)--Neighbours (9 min.)--Lines - horizontal (6 min.)--Mosaic (6 min.)--New York Lightboard Record - an excerpt (4 min.)--Begone dull care (8 min.)--Pas de deux (14 min.)--Blinkity blank (6 min.)--Synchromy (8 min.)--Animated motion #5 (8 min.)--Narcissus (22 min.)
description: Norman McLaren completed 60 films during his 50 year career. His films are a galaxy of techniques and themes. This compilation of fourteen films, many made in collaboration with Evelyn Lambart and Grant Munro, is a companion piece to "Creative process" a documentary about his life and work, and presents a selection of works that reflect the diversity of his movie-making interests, from films made without a camera to films impossible without advanced film technology. Each film is preceded by a brief summary of the technique used.
